skill.description: Generates creative domain name ideas for your project and checks availability across multiple TLDs (.com, .io, .dev, .ai, etc.). Saves hours of brainstorming and manual checking.

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation with no executable code, network calls, or filesystem access. It's a pure prompt-based skill that generates domain name suggestions.

content.user_title: Generate creative domain names with availability checking
content.value_statement: Finding an available domain name is frustrating and time-consuming. This skill instantly generates creative, relevant domain ideas and checks availability across multiple extensions.
actual_capabilities: Generates creative domain names based on project description
Checks availability across .com, .io, .dev, .ai, .app and other TLDs
Provides branding insights and explanations for each suggestion
Suggests alternatives when preferred names are taken
Offers industry-specific naming patterns and trends
limitations: Cannot actually register domains - only suggests available ones
Availability checking is based on current status and may change quickly
Does not check trademark conflicts or legal issues
Social media handle availability not included

use_cases.title: Find brandable startup domains
use_cases.description: Generate memorable, brandable domain names for new startups and products with availability across key TLDs.

use_cases.title: Name open source projects
use_cases.description: Discover available .dev, .io, and .com domains for GitHub projects, libraries, and developer tools.

use_cases.title: Create personal brand domains
use_cases.description: Find professional domain names for portfolios, blogs, and personal websites using your name or expertise.

prompt_templates.title: Basic project naming
prompt_templates.prompt: I'm building [describe your project]. Suggest 10 available domain names across .com, .io, and .dev extensions.

prompt_templates.title: Industry-specific domains
prompt_templates.prompt: I need domain names for a [industry] startup that [what it does]. Include relevant keywords and check .ai, .tech, and .com availability.

prompt_templates.title: Brandable short names
prompt_templates.prompt: Suggest short, brandable domain names (under 10 characters) for my [type of business]. Check .com and .io availability.

prompt_templates.title: Keyword-based suggestions
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate domain names that include '[keyword1]' or '[keyword2]' for my [project type]. Check multiple TLD options and suggest variations.

output_examples.input: I'm building a note-taking app for developers. Suggest domain names.
output: üèÜ Top pick: codenote.io - Short, relevant, .io signals tech tool

best_practices: Act quickly on good domains - availability changes rapidly
Register both .com and relevant extension (.io, .dev) to protect your brand
Test names verbally - ensure they're easy to pronounce and spell
Check social media handle availability for consistency across platforms
anti_patterns: Don't wait too long - good domains get registered within hours of searching
Avoid hyphenated names - they're hard to communicate verbally
Don't rely solely on .com - relevant TLDs like .dev or .ai can be better for specific audiences

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, this skill works with all major AI coding assistants including Claude, Codex, and Claude Code.

faq.question: How many domain suggestions will I get?
faq.answer: Typically 10-15 suggestions across multiple TLDs, with availability status for each.

faq.question: Can it integrate with domain registrars?
faq.answer: No, this tool only suggests and checks availability. You'll need to register domains through your preferred registrar.

faq.question: Is my project information safe?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a prompt-based tool with no data storage. Your project details are only used to generate suggestions.

faq.question: What if all suggestions are taken?
faq.answer: The tool will generate more variations and alternatives, or suggest modifying your keywords for better availability.

faq.question: How accurate is the availability checking?
faq.answer: Availability is checked in real-time, but domains can be registered by others at any time. Act quickly on good options.
